item.title: Elephant-dragon tango: Modi's visit to China signals improving ties â€” will the bonhomie last?
item.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit China after seven years, as relations had soured over border clashes in 2020.

item.title: Trump housing director Pulte lodges new criminal referral for Fed Governor Lisa Cook
item.description: President Donald Trump is seeking to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook from the board of the central bank.

item.title: Feds charge 'Subway' sandwich tosser with misdemeanor after grand jury balks at felony indictment
item.description: Sean Charles Dunn is accused of slinging a salami sub at a federal officer deployed to the streets of Washington, D.C., by President Donald Trump.

item.title: White House says Trump has fired CDC Director Susan Monarez, names temporary replacement
item.description: The White House said President Donald Trump has fired Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Director Susan Monarez after she refused to resign.

item.title: Trump railroad regulator Robert Primus was fired by White House after Amtrak Acela unveiling
item.description: Before being removed, STB member Robert Primus made clear his opposition to the merger of Union Pacific Railroad and Norfolk Southern Railroad, a unio...
